job.name: LcKppi
job.command:
cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # setenv NODEBUG yes setenv STARFPE NO # setup 64b # starver TFG20c echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set rung = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set N = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` # set name = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $4}'` else exit 1; endif set Name = `basename $PWD` set name = "" # foreach name (K_S0 Lambda0Z200cm Lambda0Z200cmFlat Lambda0_bar Lambda0 XiM_bar XiM Omega_bar Omega H3L K3pi) # DEUTERON:Lambda0Fixed DEUTERON:Lambda0 \ # K_S0Fixed Lambda0_barFixed Lambda0Fixed XiM_barFixed XiMFixed Omega_barFixed OmegaFixed \ # K_S0 Lambda0_bar Lambda0 XiM_bar XiM Omega_bar Omega \ # LNNFixed LNFixed \ # H2LrFixed H2LFixed \ # H3LdpFixed H3LFixed H3LrFixed H3RLFixed \ # H4LtpFixed H4L2dFixed H4LFixed H5LFixed H6L3Fixed H6LFixed \ # He4LFixed \ # He5L3Fixed He5LFixed He5Li5Fixed \ # He6L3adFixed He6L3Fixed He6LFixed \ # He7L3Fixed He7LFixed \ # Li6LFixed \ # Li7L3Fixed Li7LFixed \ # Li8LFixed \ # LNN LN \ # H3Ldp H3L H3Lr H3RL \ # H2Lr H2L \ # H4Ltp H4L2d H4L H5L H6L3 H6L \ # He4L \ # He5L3 He5L He5Li5 \ # He6L3ad He6L3 He6L \ # He7L3 He7L \ # Li6L \ # Li7L3 Li7L \ # Li8L \ # if ($name == $Name) break;
foreach name ( K_S0 Lambda0_bar Lambda0 gamma ) echo $Name | grep $name if (! $?) break; end echo "name = $name"; if ($name == "") exit 1; # set noiTPClu = "" # echo $Name | grep 'noiTPClu' # if (! $?) set noiTPClu = ",noiTPClu"; # setenv StarEndMakerShell # set chain = "MC.2019a,P2019a,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrY,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,Stx,KFVertex,VFMinuitX,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}; # set chain = "MC.2018,vmc,VMCAlignment,UseMCTstart,NoiTPCLu,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,StiKFVertex,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}${noiTPClu}; #StiCA set chain = "MC.OO_200GeV_2021,mc,vmc,P2021a,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrY,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,StiKFVertex,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}; # set sdt = "20210516.072525" set sdt = ""; set VFMCE = ",VFMCE"; set Chain = ${chain}${VFMCE}${sdt}",Rung."${rung} set base = ${name}_${rung}_${f}_${N}; set file = ${base}.MuDst.root set tag = ${base}.tags.root set logFile = ${base}B.log echo "${file}" if (! -r PVxyz.root) then if ( -r ../xyz.root) ln -s ../xyz.root PVxyz.root endif if ( ! -r ${file}) then root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C('${f}','${N}',"'${Chain}'",0,"'${file}'","'${tag}'")' >& ${logFile} endif
